question: What is the eligibility or entry point norms for registration of an IFC-NBFC with RBI?
option1: A minimum of 75 per cent of the total assets of an IFC-NBFC should be deployed in infrastructure loans
option2: The company should have minimum net-worth of Rs 300 crore
option3: The CRAR of of the company should be at 15% with Tier I capital at 10%
